structure.unit: B KENTUCKY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION INFRASTRUCTURE AUTHORITY

law.catch_line: Agreements for use of project authority lands.
law.text: The Commonwealth may enter into agreements with an authority regarding the use of any lands owned by it, including lands lying under water, which are deemed by the authority to be necessary for the construction or operation of any project.
law.history: Created 2009 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 85, effective June 26, 2009.
